mapper.select: select tpx.xs_id as id, xs.xh, xs.xm, xs.yzy from t_pc_xs tpx left join t_xs xs on (xs.id=tpx.xs_id) where pc_id = #{pcId} and xs.sfsc = false order by xs.cjsj desc
select distinct pc.* from t_pc_xs tpx left join t_pc pc on (pc.id=tpx.pc_id) where pc.sfsc = false and tpx.xs_id in (select xs.id from t_xs xs where xs.yzyds_id = #{szId}) order by pc.cjsj desc
select distinct pc.* from t_pc_xs tpx left join t_pc pc on (pc.id=tpx.pc_id) where pc.sfsc = false and tpx.xs_id in (select xs.id from t_xs xs where xs.qyds_id = #{qydsId}) order by pc.cjsj desc

select distinct pc.* from t_pc_xs tpx left join t_pc pc on (pc.id=tpx.pc_id) where pc.sfsc = false and tpx.xs_id in (select xs.id from t_xs xs where xs.sfsc = false and xs.yzyds_id = #{yzydsId} and xs.qyds_id = #{qydsId} ) order by pc.cjsj desc
